text: Ciel Bergman, a.k.a. Cheryl Bowers (Cheryl Marie Olsen; September 11, 1938 - January 15, 2017) was an American painter of Swedish origin. Her work, was called post-modern, and had a focus on the environment as well as feminine consciousness. She was born in Berkeley, California. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American painters Category:People from Berkeley, California
title: Ciel Bergman
